name: redux-saga
description: Saga fork.  Threading model, no redux

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.compile: rimraf lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel -d lib/ src/
scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack src/index.js dist/redux-saga.js --config webpack.config.dev.js
scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs webpack src/index.js dist/redux-saga.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build: rimraf dist es && npm run build:umd:dev && npm run build:umd:prod && npm run build:es
scripts.prepublish_old: npm run check && npm run compile && npm run build
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:prepare && gitbook build -g yelouafi/redux-saga
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:yelouafi/redux-saga gh-pages --force

author: Yassine ELOUAFI <yelouafi@gmail.com>
